search.query: index=zeek sourcetype="bro:http:json" NOT user_agent=@* | eval a=host | eval web_url=mvindex(a,-1) | eval uri_filename=mvindex(split(url,"/"),-1) | search uri_filename=*.* | table uid user_agent uri method web_url resp_mime_types uri_filename id.orig_h | stats count by resp_mime_types | search NOT resp_mime_types IN (text*,image*) | sort - count | rename count as Count, resp_mime_types as "Mime Type" | sort "Mime Type"

index=zeek sourcetype="bro:http:json" NOT user_agent=@* resp_mime_types IN ("application/x-dosexec") | eval a=host | eval web_url=mvindex(a,-1) | eval uri_filename=mvindex(split(url,"/"),-1) | search uri_filename=*.* | table uid user_agent uri method web_url resp_mime_types uri_filename id.orig_h | stats values(id.orig_h) as source by uri_filename

index=zeek sourcetype="bro:http:json" user_agent=@* resp_mime_types IN ("application/x-dosexec") | eval a=host | eval web_url=mvindex(a,-1) | eval uri_filename=mvindex(split(url,"/"),-1) | search uri_filename=*.* | table uid user_agent uri method web_url resp_mime_types uri_filename id.orig_h | stats values(id.orig_h) as source by uri_filename
